about me.name: Yongxin Lyu
about me.summary: I'm a computational materials scientist with a focus on data-driven materials discovery.

research.organization: Professor Tom Wu's Group, University of New South Wales
research.title: AI driven materials discovery
highlights: Developed an AI-assisted materials discovery pipeline for the design of 2D hybrid perovskites.
Inverse-designed novel 2D perovskite candidates targeting specific electronic properties.

research.organization: Professor Jianhua Hao's Group, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University
research.title: Modelling and synthesis of 2D materials
highlights: Investigated synthesis and luminescence in 2D materials using first-principles modeling.
Studied the mechanisms of large-scale black phosphorus growth via molecular dynamics simulations.

awards.title: Australian Government Research Training Program (RTP) Scholarship
